description: React component for a demo Twilio SMS card that allows sending SMS messages directly from the browser, with security warnings and environment variable configurations.

methods.name: getEnvFirst
methods.description: Retrieves the first environment variable value from a list of possible names.

methods.name: getTwilioConfig
methods.description: Collects Twilio configuration from environment variables, supporting both current and legacy naming conventions.

methods.name: isLikelyE164
methods.description: Validates if a phone number string is in E.164 format.

methods.name: parseTwilioError
methods.description: Parses error responses from Twilio API, attempting JSON first, then fallback to text.
